word:
Intellectual power, physical stamina, and the length of 

                                                    407 

life depend upon immutable laws. Through obedience to these laws, man may stand conqueror of himself, conqueror of his own inclinations, conqueror of principalities and powers, of "the rulers of the darkness of this world," and of "spiritual wickedness in high places" (Ephesians 6:12).--PK 488, 489 (1917).
